sections.installation:
This plugin enables you to edit and display Content Blocks in a sidebar widget or using a shortcode.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Appearance->Widgets->Post Widget (AKL Webhosting) screen to configure the plugin
  4. Drag that plugin and drop whereever you want to dislay
  5. Then that plguin automatically start displaying your posts
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

This plugin enables you to edit and display Content Blocks in a sidebar widget or using a shortcode.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Appearance->Widgets->Post Widget (AKL Webhosting) screen to configure the plugin
  4. Drag that plugin and drop whereever you want to dislay
  5. Then that plguin automatically start displaying your posts

Why you choos that plugin. ?

In this plugin you can modify your plugin heading name, posts to display, image url’s of those posts who’s featured image is not exist.

What’s new in this plugin. ?

In this plugin you can change your posts, posts thumbnails, post heading.
